mrjs volumetrics Audio Audio adds more depth to a spatial experience. Giving virtual content a greater sense of presence, and immersing users into your experience Examples rain loop thunder clap data-comp-audio you can add audio to your experience by attaching the audio component, data-comp-audio, to an entity. attributes src the path to the audio file. state the playback state values: play, pause, stop loop whether the audio should be looped values: true, false (default) distance the reach of the audio values: number, default 1m
